attributes.action: reinstate the position of Moira Stuart on Sunday AM
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While there have been complaints that Moira Sturt was unremorsely removed from her Sunday AM news slot of what is seen to be pure ageism by the BBC, there has not yet been a full public campaign which eptomises the public will that she must be reinstated in her respected slot. It is then in the public interest that a campaign to 'Save our Moira' showed be brought to the highest attention

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
